name: Lester Leroy BOWER, Jr., petitioner, v. TEXAS

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Lester Leroy BOWER, Jr., petitioner,
v.
TEXAS
attorneys: Opinion Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice SCALIA and by him referred to the Court granted pending disposition of the petition for writ of certiorari. Should the petition for writ of certiorari be denied, this stay shall terminate automatically. In the event the petition for writ of certiorari is granted, the stay shall terminate upon issuance of the mandate of this Court.
casebody.head_matter:
Lester Leroy BOWER, Jr., petitioner,
v.
TEXAS
No. 14-292 14A838
Supreme Court of the United States
Feb. 5, 2015.
Opinion Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice SCALIA and by him referred to the Court granted pending disposition of the petition for writ of certiorari. Should the petition for writ of certiorari be denied, this stay shall terminate automatically. In the event the petition for writ of certiorari is granted, the stay shall terminate upon issuance of the mandate of this Court.
